items.content_html: ValidatorPK is a lightweight npm library designed to validate Pakistani phone numbers and CNICs with ease. It provides a simple API to check formats, identify mobile networks, and ensure data authenticity. Perfect for developers building applications for the Pakistani audience.
items.title: hamzarehman033/ValidatorPK:  ValidatorPK is a lightweight npm library designed to validate Pakistani phone numbers and CNICs with ease. It provides a simple API to check formats, identify mobile networks, and ensure data authenticity. Perfect for developers building applications for the Pakistani audience.

items.content_html: Simple and lightweight React UI framework built with TypeScript. Perfect for rapid prototyping and building modern, responsive interfaces. If you're looking for a flexible, easy-to-use UI kit for your React projects, this repository has everything you need to get started quickly.

items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

items.content_html: Epsile is an open-source anonymous one-to-one chat application inspired by Omegle. It is built with a lightweight Node.js Express and Socket.io backend, offering a seamless real-time chat experience. The project is designed for simplicity, providing users with a platform to connect and chat with strangers anonymously.
items.title: Omkaarr1/Chat_room_using_websocket: Epsile is an open-source anonymous one-to-one chat application inspired by Omegle. It is built with a lightweight Node.js Express and Socket.io backend, offering a seamless real-time chat experience. The project is designed for simplicity, providing users with a platform to connect and chat with strangers anonymously.

items.content_html: Lead Tracker is a lightweight Chrome extension that helps users efficiently save and manage webpage links for tasks like research, prospecting, or resource organization. It emphasizes simplicity, privacy, and offline accessibility through local storage.
